pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 4, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 4, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

2:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg.

Foyer
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Labour-7 Consultation.

National Arts Centre
1 Elgin Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media must arrive in the City Room no later than 3 p.m.
  • Parking is available on Elgin Street or underground at the National Arts Centre
